element-citation.article-title: The black soldier-fly, Hermetia illucens (Diptera, stratiomyidae), used to estimate the postmortem interval in a case in amapá state, Brazil

ref.mixed-citation: Pujol-Luz et al., 2008 Pujol-Luz, J. R., Francez, P. A. D. C., Ururahy-Rodrigues, A.,and Constantino, R. 2008. The Black Soldier-fly, Hermetia illucens (Diptera, Stratiomyidae), Used to Estimate the Postmortem Interval in a Case in Amapa State, Brazil. J. Forensic Sci. 53, 476-478. https://doi.org/10.1111/j.1556-4029.2008.00659.x.
